TSA STORES, INC., d/b/a Sports Authority, a foreign corporation for profit, Total Facility, Inc., a foreign corporation for profit, and Piper Automotive & Marine Service, Inc., d/b/a Piper Construction, a Florida corporation for profit, Appellants,
v.
Thomas PENNELLA, Appellee. TSA Stores, Inc., d/b/a Sports Authority, a foreign corporation for profit, Appellant,
v.
Thomas Pennella, Appellee. Case No. 2D16-920
Case No. 2D16-4404 CONSOLIDATED District Court of Appeal of Florida, Second District. Opinion filed November 15, 2017

DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

Affirmed.
